name: binai-ai
description: The AI reformer. Knows what it doesn't. Teams with you to get it right.

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --workspace=BinAiDashboard && npm install --workspace=BinAiBrain
scripts.clean: npm run clean --workspace=BinAiDashboard && npm run clean --workspace=BinAiBrain && rimraf node_modules
